document.full_text: thai and cambodian troops exchanged fire early on friday, breaking a ceasefire agreed the day before to end a week of border clashes that have killed 16 people and wounded scores in southeast asia's deadliest border dispute in years.
document.title: thai soldier dies as ceasefire with cambodia breached
lines_and_colors: thai and cambodian troops exchanged fire early on friday, breaking a ceasefire agreed the day before to end a week of border clashes that have killed 16 people and wounded scores in southeast asia's deadliest border dispute in years.
